text: За все, за все тебя благодарю я:
translation: For everything, for everything I thank you:
To the secret torments of the passions,
For the bitterness of tears, the poison of a kiss,

text: За месть врагов и клевету друзей;
translation: For the vengeance of enemies and the slander of friends;

text: За жар души, растраченный в пустыне.
translation: For the heat of the soul wasted in the desert.

text: О, весна без конца и без краю
translation: Oh, spring without end and without edge

text: Без конца и без краю мечта!
translation: A dream without end and without edge!
And salute with the ringing of the shield!
And good luck, you have my regards!
In the enchanted realm of weeping,
There is no shameful laughter in the secret!
Morning in the veils of dark windows,
And the wells of earthly cities!
The illuminated expanse of the heavens below
And the toil of slave labour!
And I meet you at the doorstep

text: С буйным ветром в змеиных кудрях,
translation: With the stormy wind in its serpentine curls,
With the unsolved name of God
I will never give up my shield...
Never will you open your shoulders.....
But over us is a heady dream!
And I watch, and I measure the enmity,

text: За мученья, за гибель  я знаю
translation: For torment, for ruin, I know.
All the same: I accept you!
Accepting the world as a resounding gift,

text: Как злата горсть, я стал богат.
translation: Like a handful of gold, I became rich.
I see a fire growing, making noise
How creepy and bright it became!
The whole city is a bright sheaf of fire,
I'm over here in the corner.
I'm nailed to the wall, look!

text: Весь город мой, река, и я...
translation: My whole city, the river, and I...
Baptise with the baptism of fire
I met the unfaithful one at the entrance:
Only there is an eerie silence.
Talking to her in incoherent speeches.

text: Открывал ей все тайны с людьми,
translation: Opened up all her secrets with people,
Didn't tell anyone about the meeting,
For her to whisper: take it.....
Flying into the storm and darkness,
And by the light house, anxious,
I was left alone with the darkness.
But the possible was a dream.
You only tease with the impossible,

text: И я, как темный раб, не смею
translation: And I, as a dark slave, dare not.
To sink in fire and gloom.
Not daring to look up into the sky.....
Like the wind, you kiss greedily,
Kept in a dungeon of desolation,
A slave to madness and obedience
Till the time I lurk and wait
Only in the morning dare I leave

text: А ночью тонет в складках платья
translation: And at night she sinks into the folds of her dress
I only throw it to the crows in the morning

text: Свой хмель, свой сон, свою мечту...
translation: Your hop, your dream, your dream.....
And at night again I know, I know
What is it to be passionless?
Scourge and chide a hundred times,

text: Чтоб только быть на миг проклятым
translation: Only to be cursed for a moment

text: С тобой  в огне ночной зари!
translation: With you in the fire of the night dawn!

text: Пойми же, я спутал, я спутал
translation: You see, I'm confused, I'm confused.
A cloak has fallen over your shoulders,
Understand, in this gloom, a magician.

text: На страже, под ветром, в бреду...
translation: On guard, under the wind, in delirium.....
And the wind sings and prophesies
I have a blue dream in my future...
He wants to laugh, he does,
So you can have fun with me!
I dream about it every step of the way

text: Сквозь мглу, и огни, и морозы,
translation: Through the gloom, and the lights, and the frost,
Of the future, the wind will not tell,
That the heart is a flying bird.....
That there is a pinching laziness in my heart....
In the endless distance of corridors

text: Не она ли там пляшет вдали?
translation: Isn't she dancing in the distance?

text: От нее в этот час отвели?
translation: Has she been taken away from it at this hour?

text: Не поймете, что темен мой храм.
translation: You will not realise that my temple is dark.
The fluttering, sighing of the breast
The heart is a light bird of oblivion.
In the golden hour that flies by:
Then she, in the intoxication of spinning,
He dances to celebrate your triumph.

text: Никого ей не надо из скромных,
Ей не ум и не глупость нужны,
translation: It's not cleverness or stupidity she needs,
And he probably doesn't like the dark ones,
Leaning like me against the wall.....
Heart, soar like a light bird,
Fly, you fly, wake up love,
You must languidly bathe your eyelashes,
To the pale blond shoulders of your face!
The heart beats like a bird languishes
Then she spun away in the distance
In a light dance, a flying bird,
There's a blizzard blowing through the streets,
He's leading and I can see it's deep,
I step up and step back,
As soon as I cross the line
And I'll be in a jet of babble.
And he whispers he won't be driven away
How sweet are the mysteries of the cold.....
Look, look into the cold current,
Let me go, damn it, let me go!
Don't torture me, don't test me!

text: Уйду я в поле, в снег и в ночь,
translation: I'll go out into the field, into the snow and into the night,
the will is freer than all wills
Will not bring the free man,
And the most painful pain of all
He'll bring you back from the roundabout way!
Oh, what a sunset blush for me,
What are the evil anxieties of separation?
Everything in the world is a whirling dance
And the meeting of trembling hands!
I'm listening with an open mind,
The thin threads of my soul,

text: Ты, холод, мой холод, мой зимний,
translation: You, cold, my cold, my winter cold,
There is a passionate in my soul...
Become, O heart, a sighing schemer,
Once again it flies, it flies, it flies,
It's ringing, and the snow is spinning, spinning, spinning,
You're a vision in a gentle dance,
She went round the snowy plain
I can hear you talking openly,
I look into the clear eye.....
I'll pass it on with one smile...
We've got the night with us!
You're back on the shaky path
All the visions, all the betrayals....
In a snowy goblet full of foam,
Wrap it up, lock it up,

text: И вот опять, опять в возвратный
translation: And here we go again, back to the return
What kind of dance is this?

text: И словно мечтанье, и словно круженье,
translation: And like a dream and like a whirl,
The earth is fleeing, the firmament is hiding,

text: И словно безумье, и словно мученье,
translation: And like madness and like torment,

text: Забвенье и удаль, смятенье и смерть,
translation: Oblivion and fortune, confusion and death,
And with a strange radiance shine the features....

text: Там с посвистом, да с присвистом
translation: There's a whistle and a whistle and a whistle
I look at me and throw up my hands,

text: С ума сойду, сойду с ума,
translation: I'm going crazy, I'm going crazy,

text: Что вся ты  ночь, и вся ты  тьма,
translation: That all of you are night, and all of you are darkness,
What I sing about you, I sing to you,
Under the holiday, others will be sweet,
With the others, a dashing soldier
She'll go, chin up, in a round dance.

text: Ты знай про себя, что не хуже
translation: You know you're just as good
The other one would have danced like that!

text: Что мог бы стянуть и потуже
translation: That I could have pulled it tighter.

text: Что ростом и станом ты вышел

translation: Older and more handsome than the others,
Other young ladies of good fortune!
Though the swarthy cheeks are pale,

text: Ах, сладко, как сладко, так сладко
translation: Ah, sweet, so sweet, so sweet.
And to know that a dashing soldier girl
She went out of the village, into the round dance!

text: И я опять затих у ног
translation: And I'm at my feet again

text: У ног давно и тайно милой,
translation: At the feet of a long and secretly sweetheart,
The blizzard is on the doorstep
The fire of the white-winged blizzard
When the blizzard sings, sings, sings.....

text: В хмельной и злой своей темнице
translation: In his drunken and wicked dungeon.

text: И предо мной возник из снега
И с тайной грустью, с грустью нежной,
translation: And with a secret sadness, a tender sadness,
Like snow falling off a petal,
The living name of the Snow Maiden
